title: Riding Angel: A Biker Erotic Romance
description: Nikka is hot for Cox. Daddy’s good little girl was what Nikka was, exactly as she was supposed to be, until she discovered at school what fun daddy’s bad little girl could have. Then in college she figured that the bad boys had the keys to the funhouse. She was not ready for how bad these boys are.Nikka is the police chief’s daughter, Cox is the hot vice president of the local motorcycle club and they are not meant to be together. Especially not when gang wars threaten Savage MC .Will Nikka’s passion overcome the obstacles, and how can she keep Cox’s mind away from discovering her own deadly secrets?The first three Savage MC stories are re-edited and included here within the longer, deeper tale for which they were originally intended.
author: Alice May Ball
